fields.description: Odoo connector: User for the connection
Odoo connector: Password for the connection. For improved security we recommend specifying this password in the djangosettings.py file instead of this parameter.
Odoo connector: Database to connect to
Odoo connector: URL for the XML-RPC server
Odoo connector: Language to use during the connection
Odoo connector: Company name for which to create PO, MOs and WOs
Odoo connector: Default location for production boms whose location isn't specified in Odoo
Odoo connector: Calendar to be applied to all locations
Odoo connector: filter purchase orders for automatic exports
Odoo connector: filter manufacturing orders for automatic exports
Odoo connector: filter distribution orders for automatic exports
